title: How to Kill the Last Boss in Silent Hill

steps.headline: If you allow Dahlia to successfully complete the ritual, you will get this boss.
steps.description: This boss occurs in the bad ending, which you could get in more than two ways, mostly by using Fire-Arms(Guns instead of melee weapons(Hand held defense items).

steps.headline: Equip your rifle, handgun, or shotgun.
steps.description: If you see lightning, either run away or shoot into her chest. Shooting into her chest will cause more damage than regular shots, but it is a good idea to run away.

steps.headline: As you escape her wrath, run in zigzagging patterns so the lightning won't reach you.
steps.description: If you get hit, use 1 or 2 NUTRITION RINKS or a FIRST-AID KIT.

steps.headline: As you shoot her,notice the gate that surrounds her,you cannot shoot through this, so when shooting shoot at the opening of the gate,(NOTE:This will make it easier to to let her hurt you).
You will receive this ending, by ruining the ritual that Dahlia is trying to complete,and killing more enemies with Melee weapons.
Equip your RIFLE,and take 10 shots at her.
If it doesn't die, equip your SHOTGUN and proceed.

text: The Child Goddess If you allow Dahlia to successfully complete the ritual, you will get this boss. This boss occurs in the bad ending, which you could get in more than two ways, mostly by using Fire-Arms(Guns instead of melee weapons(Hand held defense items). Equip your rifle, handgun, or shotgun. If you see lightning, either run away or shoot into her chest. Shooting into her chest will cause more damage than regular shots, but it is a good idea to run away. As you escape her wrath, run in zigzagging patterns so the lightning won't reach you. If you get hit, use 1 or 2 NUTRITION RINKS or a FIRST-AID KIT. As you shoot her,notice the gate that surrounds her,you cannot shoot through this, so when shooting shoot at the opening of the gate,(NOTE:This will make it easier to to let her hurt you).  The Winged Monster You will receive this ending, by ruining the ritual that Dahlia is trying to complete,and killing more enemies with Melee weapons.  Equip your RIFLE,and take 10 shots at her.  If it doesn't die, equip your SHOTGUN and proceed.
sentences: The Child Goddess If you allow Dahlia to successfully complete the ritual, you will get this boss.
This boss occurs in the bad ending, which you could get in more than two ways, mostly by using Fire-Arms(Guns instead of melee weapons(Hand held defense items).
Equip your rifle, handgun, or shotgun.
If you see lightning, either run away or shoot into her chest.
Shooting into her chest will cause more damage than regular shots, but it is a good idea to run away.
As you escape her wrath, run in zigzagging patterns so the lightning won't reach you.
If you get hit, use 1 or 2 NUTRITION RINKS or a FIRST-AID KIT.
As you shoot her,notice the gate that surrounds her,you cannot shoot through this, so when shooting shoot at the opening of the gate,(NOTE:This will make it easier to to let her hurt you).
The Winged Monster You will receive this ending, by ruining the ritual that Dahlia is trying to complete,and killing more enemies with Melee weapons.
Equip your RIFLE,and take 10 shots at her.
If it doesn't die, equip your SHOTGUN and proceed.
